i cry while u sleep

but also while you're awake
Character Bios
Home


A lot of my comics are sort of commentary on modern social phenomena that I experience or embody, and so I use myself as the stand in and generic non-persons to interact with. But since it is also 100% true events, some of the other characters are actual people.


Bria
Just like my character in the comic, I am a caricature of myself.
Assorted Coworkers
I normally don't name them, except for Tom.
Gosia
Gosia plays the vital role in my life of mutual complainer.
Kelly
Kelly serves as my EDM consultant and general ghost wrangler.
Marianne
Sometimes she kinda gets me, ya know?
Mark
Mark is a mathematician, can't you tell?
Mike
Mike used to be around a lot more, but now he only shows up once in a while to remind me why he doesn't love me.
Mom
I'm probably at least partially her fault.
Rob
Rob lives in my house and occasionally gives me really good advice.
Tony
Tony only exists inside my phone.
Dudes I totally have a Patreon
(The money goes to charity.)
